title: If deleting an email by mistake ,Why can't we undo it?
content: Why can we not (undo) when deleting a email y mistake?
creator: Tvsatman

title: tools-delete all marked as junk
content: I moved from 115.10.1 32 bit to 115.10.2 64 bit. What the hell happened to everything? No file menu standard bar, tools menu moved from top left to hidden menu drop down on top right (you should NEVER move controls from one side to the other), no way to delete all marked as junk? This is unusable.
creator: jas14

title: Deleting gmail emails without deleting them on Tb
content: I recently had to change my email address to a gmail account. I want to continue to use Tb but don't want copies kept on the Gmail account. Is there a way to delete the messages in Gmail without deleting them in Tb.
creator: sue.nicolaou3892

title: Move email accounts up or down on my Thunderbird home page
content: I would like to know if I can move my email accounts up or down on my Thunderbird home page. I am phasing out one of my email accounts and I would like to move it from the top of my email account list and position my primary account at the top.
creator: allsteamedup
